content:
Glenn asked me to say this advertisement line.
I suggested making it a catchy rhyme instead,
but he flat-out refused!!

content: Except for questions like "how do I throw punches properly?"

content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>'s new home looks amazing!
It reminds me of a poem:
"A cottage in autumn winds..."

content:
The plaza's perfect for practicing my punches!
But Sani says my moves are too powerful and I'm sending cars flying,
so I'm not allowed to "dance" near the Camp. (sulking)

content:
The old "tent car" got quite the makeover!
So I guess its new name must be—<size=64>house car?!</size>
<size=30>Wait, does this even count as a "car" anymore?</size>

content:

Waiting for Glenn to let his guard down so I can grab him and
measure his height—<size=64>NOPE!</size>

content:

"camper van" or "van camper"?

content:
I love coming to the Omni-Gallery - there are so many books!
Though there's just one tiny thing missing...
They don't have any martial arts manuals!

when I heard something on the radio
about strange happenings at the Omni-Gallery.
